name: Dice Kings
description:
Play for free and try your luck as you roll your way to the top in the most unique dice game on the app store! SMASH the board in DICE KINGS!

BREAK everything in sight as you hunt for rewards and collectibles to conquer each section of the city. DICE KINGS isn’t just another board game. This is a whole new way to play dice!

Features:
CRAZY DICE ACTION - Blast or sling the dice to conquer the board
COLLECT ALL THE THINGS - Hunt for items and and hit the jackpot
FREE DAILY ROLLS - Keep your streak alive and get more rolls every day

Riches and rewards await the DICE KINGS!

For feature requests or feedback, please send us an email to dksupport@luckyday.com.
